channel.title: Misc on 始まれば終わる
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on 始まれば終わる

item.title: Hello, world.
item.description: Welcome to ktnyt’s blog. I will randomly post things related to Go, C++, and more. Programming related things will be in English. Other things will occasionally be in Japanese. The blog title is a quote by Natsumi TAKAMORI which roughly translates to “What’s begun, will end”. Its original nuance is that “bad things will eventually pass”, but I personally think it can be applied to many more things in life.
